DOC.brief_summary: To find information treat impotence vardenafil comparison placebo affect quality life ( QoL ) men partner . Subjects receive 10mg vardenafil placebo 4 week follow 8 week period dose vardenafil may reduce 5mg increase 20mg . Subjects receive 'preferred ' dose 14 week . During time Quality Life Measures collect via questionnaire
DOC.brief_title: A Double-blind `` Preferred '' Vardenafil Dose Study QoL Functional Outcomes Males With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Males erectile dysfunction six month accord NIH Consensus Statement ( inability achieve maintain penile erection sufficient satisfactory sexual performance ) Stable , heterosexual relationship six month Documented write Informed Consent , patient partner , receive adequate previous information prior study specific procedure . An EDEQoL score < = 15 . An IIEF score < = 25 . Presence penile anatomical abnormality ( eg . penile fibrosis Peyronie 's disease ) would significantly impair erectile function . History radical prostatectomy . Retinitis pigmentosa . History positive test Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HbsAg ) Hepatitis C. Unstable angina pectoris . History myocardial infarction , stroke , electrocardiographic ischaemia ( except stable angina ) , lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month . Atrial tachyarrhythmia ( eg . atrial fibrillation/flutter ) heart rate > 100 beat per minute screening . ChildPugh class B liver disease liver function abnormality . Clinically significant chronic haematological disease bleed disorder History significant peptic ulcer disease within one year Visit 1 Resting hypotension ( rest systolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg ) hypertension ( rest systolic blood pressure > 170 mm Hg rest diastolic blood pressure > 110 mm Hg ) . Symptomatic postural hypotension within six month Visit 1 . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( haemoglobin A1c > 12 % ) . Patients take nitrate nitric oxide donor ( e.g . molsidomine ) . Patients take anticoagulant , exception antiplatelet agent . Patients take androgen ( e.g . testosterone ) , trazodone antiandrogens . Patients take follow inhibitor cytochrome P 450 CYP 3A4 : potent HIV protease inhibitor ( ritonavir , indinavir ) , antimycotic agent itraconazole ketoconazole ( topical form allow ) erythromycin .
